page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: At 3.45pm it is time to go home.As I near my house I tip toe the last bit so as not to set Bobby barking TOO LATE.Mum says "Would you like a cuppa?" "Yes please," I reply."We had maths again today" "Never mind,we had maths everyday when I was at school". In the evening after my tea I go to The Tarn , our local park. It is a bird sanctuary too.The Anerican lady,who is interested in birds is not there so I go home. On the way I saw some friends so we play till I have to go home. It is a school day tomorrow so I have to go to bed at about half past nine. I lay thinking about the day till I fall asleep.
